resources.string: Stay linked wherever you are. Discover PathLink Express now for effortless tracking and sharing!
Add friends, chat instantly, and stay close.
Sleek Interface, Effortless Experience: Our app boasts a sleek interface for effortless navigation.
Please ensure the phone number field is not left blank.
Please ensure the otp field is not left blank.
Please make sure to fill in the password field.
Phone number is not in the correct format.
Create an account to connect and share with friends and family
OTP code is sent via phone number.
Please enter the OTP code sent to your phone number... to complete the registration.
Password must contain at least 6 letters, numbers, and special characters.
Please do not leave your full name blank
You can later change who can see your gender on your profile
Enter your name in real life

"To enhance your experience, please grant the following permissions:

" + "1. Location Access: We require access to your device's location to provide location-based services and features.

" + "2. Location Sharing: You can choose to share your location with others using our app. This helps you stay connected with friends and family.

" + "Please follow the steps below to grant these permissions:

" + "1. Open the Settings app on your device.

" + "2. Scroll down and tap on 'Privacy.'

" + "3. Tap on 'Location Services.'

" + "4. Enable 'Location Services' by toggling the switch.

" + "5. Scroll down and find our app in the list of installed apps.

" + "6. Tap on our app's name.

" + "7. Select 'While Using the App' to allow location access while the app is in use.

" + "8. Go back to our app and enjoy the enhanced features.

" + "Thank you for choosing our app! If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team."
if you leave page,any change you have made will be lost
